paragraphs.title: Downloading CTD chemical to diseases dataset
paragraphs.text:
%sh

# Modify to correct working directory
URL=http://ctdbase.org/reports/CTD_chemicals_diseases.csv.gz
TARGET=~/data/biohackathon18/CTD_chemicals_diseases.csv.gz
if [ ! -f $TARGET ]; then
    wget $URL -O $TARGET
fi
echo "File save to $TARGET"

%sh
# Modify to correct working directory
cd  ~/Projects/biohackathon-2018/data/
unzip CTD_chemicals_diseases.csv.gz

paragraphs.title: Set delimiter and load CTD data using SparkContext (sc)
paragraphs.text:
// Modify to correct working directory
sc.hadoopConfiguration.set("textinputformat.record.delimiter","\n//\n")
val ctdChemDisTxt = (sc.textFile("~/Projects/biohackathon-2018/data/CTD_chemicals_diseases.csv")
                      .sample(false, 1))
                      

// OMIM identifiers are only the number
case class CtdChemDis(ChenicalName:String, DiseaseName:String, DiseaseId:String, Gene:String, OMIMId:Integer)


val ctdChemDisDat = ctdChemDisTxt.filter(l => !l.startsWith("#")).map(l => l.split(",")).map(l => CtdChemDis(l(0),l(4),l(5),l(6),l(8).toInt))

msg.data:
ctdChemDisTxt: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = PartitionwiseSampledRDD[41] at sample at <console>:27
defined class CtdChemDis
ctdChemDisDat: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[CtdChemDis] = MapPartitionsRDD[44] at map at <console>:29
<console>:32: error: value dump is not a member of org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[CtdChemDis]
       print(ctdChemDisDat.dump(df))
                           ^
<console>:32: error: not found: value df
       print(ctdChemDisDat.dump(df))
                                ^

paragraphs.text:
%sh
# Modify to correct working directory
cd  ~/Projects/biohackathon-2018/data/
rm CTD_chemicals_diseases.csv

paragraphs.title: Downloading CTD disease pathway dataset
paragraphs.text:
%sh
# Modify to correct working directory
URL=http://ctdbase.org/reports/CTD_diseases_pathways.csv.gz
TARGET=~/data/biohackathon18/CTD_diseases_pathways.csv.gz
if [ ! -f $TARGET ]; then
    wget $URL -O $TARGET
fi
echo "File save to $TARGET"

%sh
# Modify to correct working directory
cd  ~/Projects/biohackathon-2018/data/
unzip CTD_chemicals_diseases.csv.gz

// Modify to correct working directory
sc.hadoopConfiguration.set("textinputformat.record.delimiter","\n//\n")
val ctdDisPathTxt = (sc.textFile("~/Projects/biohackathon-2018/data/CTD_diseases_pathways.csv")
                      .sample(false, 1))
                      
// All variables are String type
case class CtdDisPath(DiseaseName:String,DiseaseID:String,PathwayName:String,PathwayID:String,InferenceGeneSymbol:String)


val ctdDisPathDat = ctdDisPathTxt.filter(l => !l.startsWith("#")).map(l => l.split(",")).map(l => CtdDisPath(l(0),l(1),l(2),l(3),l(4)))

msg.data:
ctdDisPathTxt: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = PartitionwiseSampledRDD[29] at sample at <console>:27
defined class CtdDisPath
ctdDisPathDat: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[CtdDisPath] = MapPartitionsRDD[32] at map at <console>:29

paragraphs.text:
%sh
# Modify to correct working directory
cd  ~/Projects/biohackathon-2018/data/
rm CTD_chemicals_pathways.csv
